author: henrib
msg: Fix for JEXL-131; modified the code as mentioned in the mailing list thread. (http://apache-commons.680414.n4.nabble.com/jexl-Unified-jexl-throws-exception-when-processing-white-space-in-file-tt4578778.html);
Fix for method exception not being reported correctly, backport of jexl3 behavior;
Fix for variable/property existence versus null operands raising the correct exceptions: added separate strict flag to JexlEngine so JexlArithmetic can have its own , backport of jexl3 behavior.
Fix for decimal number constants not defaulting to "double" behavior ( aka Grace's JEXL-126 fixed in jexl3 backport);
